description: Imports a CSV file and converts to a datatable.

input.name: files list
input.description: The file containing a .csv or .tsv formatted data.

input.name: encoding
input.description:
Input file encoding. Supported encodings are: ascii, base64, binary, hex, ucs2, utf8, or latin1.
If unspecified, defaults to "utf8".

input.name: separator
input.description:
Character used as column delimiter. Leave blank to auto-detect from a list of most common delimiters.
If unspecified, defaults to "," (blank).
